attributes.action: avoid holding a General Election on October 11th because it is Dizzy's birthday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Speculation is now rife that an October general election may be held on October 11th. This happens to be the birthday of the political blogger Dizzy Thinks who deserves not to have his birthday ruined at the Prime Minister's whim. It is everyone's right to have a birthday free from national politics so that copious alcohol can be drunk all day without having to worry about polling station telling, forgetting to vote and knocking up whilst lashed.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
